title: American Sociological Review - Race and Networks in the Job Search Process
description: Author David S. Pedulla discusses his article, "Race and Networks in the Job Search," co-authored with Devah Pager. This article is published in the December 2019 issue of American Sociological Review.
content:encoded: Author David S. Pedulla discusses his article, "Race and Networks in the Job Search," co-authored with Devah Pager. This article is published in the December 2019 issue of American Sociological Review.
itunes:subtitle: An American Sociological Association Podcast
